name: Calibri my sites; changes the font on many sites
description:
This is "web+calibri" which switches the font of web sites to Calibri, but does it for the web sites I go to most.

By the way, I'm constantly adding to this. If you use it and notice that it messes up the way a website works (For example, I know that it messes up Google docs), let me know
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document 
domain("amazon.com"),
domain("apple.com"),
domain("army.mil"),
domain("armytimes.com"),
domain("ballotpedia.org"),
domain("bbc.co.uk"),
domain("bing.com"),
domain("blogger.com"),
domain("blogspot.com"),
domain("businessweek.com"),
domain("cfr.org"),
domain("cnn.com"),
domain("columbia.edu"),
domain("congress.gov"),
domain("craigslist.org"),
domain("crs.gov"),
domain("dfas.mil"),
domain("doublex.com"),
domain("ebay.com"),
domain("elpais.com"),
domain("espn.go.com"),
domain("facebook.com"),
domain("flickr.com"),
domain("forbes.com"),
domain("foreignpolicy.com"),
domain("ft.com"),
domain("gawker.com"),
domain("georgetown.edu"),
domain("go.com"),
domain("mail.google.com"),
domain("www.google.com"),
domain("googleusercontent.com"),
domain("gwu.edu"),
domain("house.gov"),
domain("huffingtonpost.com"),
domain("imdb.com"),
domain("latimes.com"),
domain("lifehacker.com"),
domain("linkedin.com"),
domain("live.com"),
domain("merriam-webster.com"),
domain("microsoft.com")
domain("minneapolisfed.org"),
domain("msn.com"),
domain("newsweek.com"),
domain("newyorker.com"),
domain("nytimes.com"),
domain("nyu.edu"),
domain("obamaalumni.ning.com"),
domain("observer.com"),
domain("ocregister.com"),
domain("pandora.com"),
domain("paypal.com"),
domain("poemhunter.com"),
domain("project-syndicate.org"),
domain("prospect.org"),
domain("realclearpolitics.com"),
domain("rollcall.com"),
domain("salon.com"),
domain("seekingalpha.com"),
domain("sfgate.com"),
domain("skillport.com"),
domain("slate.com"),
domain("theatlantic.com"),
domain("thebigmoney.com"),
domain("thedailybeast.com"),
domain("time.com"),
domain("tinypic.com"),
domain("tumblr.com"),
domain("tweetdeck.com"),
domain("twitter.com"),
domain("upenn.edu"),
domain("usaid.gov"),
domain("usatoday.com"),
domain("userstyles.org"),
domain("washingtonpost.com"),
domain("wikipedia.org"),
domain("wordpress.com"),
domain("wordreference.com"),
domain("worldbank.org"),
domain("wsj.com"),
domain("yahoo.com"),
domain("youtube.com")
{
	
	/* applies font to all generic HTML tags */
	*,
        html,
	body,
	span,
	div,
	td,
	br,
	input,
	font,
	button,
	select,
	option {
		font-family: Calibri !important;
		font-size: 11pt !important;
	}
	
	/* specifies width of web search results column */
	td.j {
		width: 75% !important;
	}
}
	
@-moz-document domain(mail.google.com) {

	/* corrects navigation column width in gmail */
	#nav {
		width: 150px !important;
	}
	#co {
		margin-left: 150px !important;
	}
}
